thread.section_title: Metropolitan Movers Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Metropolitan Movers | metropolitanmovers.ca
thread.title: Mathew

author: Mathew
title: Mathew
text: I used Metropolitan for the first time yesterday and I could not be happier with my overall experience.Team were absolutely amazing and I will definitely be using this company again for any future moves I may have. I especially appreciated tram for taking the time to talk everything through with us before, after, and during the move to make us feel completely comfortable with the whole thing. He and his team were very respectful of us and our possessions. I was so amazed with how stress-free this was from start to finish.
